title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When I open the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only), I notice that the scrollbars are enabled. I am able to move the scrollbars around, but they do not have any effect. Additionally, when I open a small image, such as an icon, the scrollbars are present but they do not serve any purpose.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only). 2. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled. 3. Try moving the scrollbars around and observe that they do not have any effect. 4. Open a small image, such as an icon, and observe that the scrollbars are present but they do not do anything.
